DIA_KUNO_CUTSCENE_03_01: I told you this would happen! I told you it was a matter of time, and look - I was right!
DIA_LEON_CUTSCENE_03_02: What do you think you were right about?
DIA_KUNO_CUTSCENE_03_03: Morris has learned nothing from the recent protests!
DIA_LEON_CUTSCENE_03_04: But who could have expected that some madman...
DIA_KUNO_CUTSCENE_03_05: Not a madman, just people - ordinary people who have had enough of the government and its clowns looking into their purses for years!
DIA_LEON_CUTSCENE_03_06: And you're still doing the same thing...
